titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to John Steele
CWG13720

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
56
20
1120
The State of Kentucky
To John Steele Dr

row.cell: To 20 Bushels Corn at 50c per Bushel

body.p: For the use of 3rd Battalion 14th Ky Cavalry.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the articles were furnished as stated: and that they were a necessary for the public service.
Received at Frankfort on, the 20 of March --, 1863, of Jno W. Finnell Adjt Genl Quartermaster, Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Twenty one -- Dollars and cents, in full of the above account.

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky vols

The State of Kentucky
To John Steele Dr

row.cell: To 20 Bushels Corn at 50c per Bushel

body.p: For the use of 3rd Battalion 14th Ky Cavalry.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the articles were furnished as stated: and that they were necessary for the public service,
Received at Frankfort Ky the 20 of March --, 1863, of Jno W. Finnell Adjt Genl Quartermaster, Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Twenty one -- Dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account,

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky vols

31no. 33
no. 71 Abstract
John Steele
$21.00
Paid March 20. 1863
allowed Aug 8 1863
